Header: Brigadier Akuranthilake Assumes His New Office
Content: Brigadier N.P Akuranthilake of Sri Lanka Signal Corps (SLSC) assumed office as the new Director of the Army Research Analysis, Projection and Development Branch on Thursday (2) at his office in the Army Cantonment at Panagoda. The newly-appointed Director left his signature in an official document and symbolized the acceptance of the new office, amid religious observances. Staff officers, Officers and Other Ranks in the Directorate were present at the occasion.
